response.overview: A group of teen boys are playing poker in their friends basement when one of them gets up to use the bathroom. While at first, everything seems normal, when the boy returns, he starts giving signs that he is not who he appears... In this groundbreaking short film, the 3rd of Director Malcolm Reed and his production company "Mavon", Malcolm explores the horrors of false reality, and delves into the complex world of what does it mean to be somebody.
response.tagline: A group of teens become suspect that their friend is not who he says he is
response.title: Bluff
